headline: Fortinet (FTNT) Surpasses Q3 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
summary: Fortinet (FTNT) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 23.53% and 2.09%, respectively, for the quarter ended September 2024. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: Fortinet (FTNT) Surpasses Q3 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
raw.summary: Fortinet (FTNT) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 23.53% and 2.09%, respectively, for the quarter ended September 2024. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Fortinet's quarterly revenue forecast disappoints, shares fall
summary: High-interest rates, which are affecting borrowing for investment, have dampened enterprise spending as businesses grapple with economic uncertainty.  Fortinet is also facing stiff competition from bigger players such as Palo Alto Networks, which offer a comprehensive range of cybersecurity solutions, constraining the growth of smaller cybersecurity firms.  In September, Fortinet said that an individual gained unauthorized access to files stored on its third-party cloud-based shared file drive, which involved limited data related to a small number of customers.

headline: Fortinet shares fall 8% after earnings
summary: Fortinet Inc (NASDAQ:FTNT) reported third-quarter earnings that surpassed analyst expectations, but shares tumbled 8% in after-hours trading despite the cybersecurity firm raising its full-year outlook.

headline: Stock Market Today: Nasdaq, S&P 500 Add Gains But Small Caps Lag; Fed Makes Expected Rate Cut (Live Coverage)
summary: The stock market closed mostly higher Thursday but trimmed some gains in afternoon trading after the Federal Reserve cut interest rates by a quarter point, as expected.  The Dow Jones Industrial Average ended flat.  The Fed did what everyone expected: It lowered the fed funds rate by 25 basis points to a range of 4.50% to 4.75%.

headline: Fortinet: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The average estimate of 14 analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of 51 cents per share. The network security company posted revenue of $1.51 billion in the period, also beating Street forecasts. Fourteen analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $1.48 billion.

raw.headline: Fortinet: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: The average estimate of 14 analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of 51 cents per share. The network security company posted revenue of $1.51 billion in the period, also beating Street forecasts. Fourteen analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $1.48 billion.

headline: Fortinet Reports Third Quarter 2024 Financial Results
summary: Highlights Total revenue up 13% year over year; service revenue up 19% year over yearBillings1 and product revenue returns to growthStrong billings growth in Unified SASE and Security OperationsRecord GAAP operating margin of 31.2%Record Non-GAAP operating margin of 36.1%1Cash flow from operations of $608 million; Free cash flow of $572 million1Raising 2024 revenue and non-GAAP operating margin guidanceShare repurchase authorization increased by $1 billion; remaining authorization of $2 billion

headline: Stock Market Today: Indexes Steady After Fed Cuts Rates; AppLovin Soars 40%, But MakeMyTrip Dives (Live Coverage)
summary: The stock market had a muted reaction after the Federal Reserve cut interest rates by a quarter point Thursday afternoon.  AppLovin led the upside among IBD 50-style growth stocks, but IBD Sector Leaders list member MakeMyTrip of India fell sharply after a long and strong upward run.  The Fed did what everyone expected: It lowered the fed funds rate by 25 basis points to a range of 4.50% to 4.75%.
